fields.template_content:
[Unit]
Description=Arthexis suite watchdog for {service_name}
After=network-online.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart={base_dir}/scripts/helpers/watchdog.sh {service_name}
Restart=always
RestartSec=15
User={service_user}

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
